For all of you that are asking if it has Extras:  If you read the comments of the poster as follows:
Extra's............: Part stripped 
This means that the Extras were stripped out of the film before posting it here.  
DL and read the TXT files that 2Lions puts in the torrents.  You'll understand why this is done!  :)
